name: agewise
description: AgeWise is a AgeWise is a chatbot application designed to provide educational support and personalized advice for individuals experiencing chronic pain. Utilizing OpenAI's advanced AI, AgeWise offers an interactive platform for users to learn about non-pharmacological pain management techniques, understand their conditions better, and explore potential solutions for improved well-being.
author: Ryan Pond, John Bernardo, Next Level Physical Therapy INC.
